column4: can anyone help me with grub because noone is speaking in #grub
i installed ubuntu about 4 days ago and then did a load of upgrades including an upgrade for grub, wen i retstarted grub i got an error saying =
and now i cant boot up in any os
did you install using wubi or a nomal install ?
i did it from th windows installer off the ubuntu website
ok that's "wubi", type ls and write what shows up
type ls and write what shows up
if u didnt get that its the C: Drive
ok type each one of these commands and tell me if there's an error: set root=(loop0)
could you pm me the commands
nope no error come up then
